Generation VIII.Sword: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence you violently.
Generation VIII.Shield: Using the braids on its head, it pummels foes to get them to quiet down. One blow from those braids would knock out a professional boxer.

Generation IX.Scarlet: To this Pokémon, strong emotions apparently feel like incredibly loud noises—even if the emotions are happy ones.
Generation IX.Violet: The moment this Pokémon finds someone who's emitting strong emotions, it will pummel them senseless with its braids to silence them.
